description: This file provides utility functions for handling PDF data URLs, including normalization, validation, and conversion to Blob URLs. It is used to facilitate the processing and display of PDF files within a web application, likely in scenarios such as previewing or downloading PDFs from data URLs or raw base64 strings.
external_files: none (uses browser APIs such as URL and atob, which are built-in)

methods.name: isPdfDataUrl(value)
methods.description: Checks if a string is a valid PDF data URL starting with 'data:application/pdf'.

methods.name: normalizePdfInput(maybe)
methods.description: Normalizes input to a proper PDF data URL, either returning the input if valid or converting raw base64 strings to data URLs.

methods.name: base64PdfToBlobUrl(dataUrl)
methods.description: Converts a PDF data URL or base64 string into a Blob URL suitable for use in browsers, with error handling for various failure modes.
